Message.description: 错误的时候，返回的错误信息

ImageData.description:
- 图片翻译结构化数据

```
[
  {
    "errorCode": "200",
    "sourceUrl": "https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i3/2838892713/O1CN01AJHAFq1Vub9eKog8t_!!2838892713.jpg",
    "success": true,
    "topRequestId": "of8hp0d9ne81",
    "url": "https://ae01.alicdn.com/kf/H86dc34f146e1488aa55a0435ebd1775cu.jpeg"
  },
  {
    "errorCode": "200",
    "sourceUrl": "https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i2/2838892713/O1CN01Ko5Mxu1Vub9Y85K6p_!!2838892713.jpg",
    "success": true,
    "topRequestId": "of8hp0d9ne81",
    "url": "https://ae01.alicdn.com/kf/H1cc74cbdfc554b278dfaa8b2ede33f48D.jpeg"
  }
]
```

- sourceURL 原始图片地址
- URL翻译后的图片地址

103.errorMessage: An error occurred while decoding the URL. Verify that the specified URL is encoded.

105.errorMessage: The specified language pair is not supported.

106.errorMessage: An error occurred while detecting the language.

108.errorMessage: The maximum length of the specified string is exceeded.

110.errorMessage: The account has not activated the service.

112.errorMessage: Failed to call the translation service.

113.errorMessage: The service is not activated or the account has an outstanding balance.

title: 获取异步图片翻译结果
summary: 通过任务ID获取异步图片翻译结果。
